item.description:
MassHighTech’s 9th Annual BioForum: “Building A Better Biotech”
When: Thursday, February 17, from 7:30 a.m. to 10:00 a.m.
Where: Merck Research Laboratories
33 Avenue Louis Pasteur
Boston, MA
Register: http://masshightech.b...
Entrepreneurs and executives will convene to discuss and debate today’s best biotech business model: What’s being funded in 2011? Platforms or products? Virtual businesses or brick-and-mortar biotechs? And who’s funding them — angels? VCs? Strategic? Foundations? Join MHT for this exclusive executive breakfast.
Keynote Speaker:
Noubar Afeyan, Managing Partner & CEO, Flagship Ventures
Panel to include:
Jeffrey Quillen, Partner, Foley Hoag (Moderator)
Bonnie Fendrock, President and CEO, Hepregen Corp.
Maggie Flanagan LeFiore, Ph.D, Venture Partners, MedImmune Ventures
Dennis Goldberg, President and CEO, Lipimetix LLC
Daphne Zohar, Founder/Managing Partner, Pure Tech Ventures
item.name: MassHighTech’s 9th Annual BioForum: “Building A Better Biotech”
